name: Under the Hood (Exudias)
description:
An arcade simulation game made for the TriJam #176 (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-176)

The jam theme: Loading process

You are the system behind the scenes that actually manages the loading bars and wills games into existence for their players. You will be loading in the character, the ground they stand on, the backdrop, and, of course, the music, all with their seperate bar.

What's the catch? You are managing loading bars, after all, so you must abide by their rules of randomly stopping.

There are 2700 possible game combinations you could generate, and the game gets harder as you get more of a streak going.

There is a built-in score counter, should you want to strive to become better.

Controls:

Q - Load top-left bar

P - Load top-right bar

Z - Load bottom-left bar

M - Load bottom-right bar

Escape - Quit

I did use a lot of free assets for this, since it was impossible to create all the assets in a reasonable amount of time
